org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

类 RowMutations

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RowMutations
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Comparable<Row>, Row

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public class RowMutations
extends Object
implements Row
    Performs multiple mutations atomically on a single row. Currently Put and Delete are supported. The mutations are performed in the order in which they were added.

    We compare and equate mutations based off their row so be careful putting RowMutations into Sets or using them as keys in Maps.

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Row

      • RowMutations

        public RowMutations(byte[] row,

        Create an atomic mutation for the specified row.
        参数:
        row - row key
        initialCapacity - the initial capacity of the RowMutations

    • 方法详细资料

      • of

        public static RowMutations of(List<? extends Mutation> mutations)
                       throws IOException
        Create a RowMutations with the specified mutations.
        参数:
        mutations - the mutations to send
        返回:
        RowMutations
        抛出:
        IOException - if any row in mutations is different to another

        参数:
        p - The Put to add
        抛出:
        IOException - if the row of added mutation doesn't match the original row
